items.name: J.C Le Roux La Fleurette / Le Domaine
J.C Le Roux Le Domaine
items.description: Spicy Turkish delight blend of Sauvignon Blanc, Chenin Blanc and Muscat. Sweet but focused finish.

items.name: J.C Le Roux La Fleurette
items.description: Sweet, floral multi-variety fizz.

items.name: J.C Le Roux La Fleurette Non Alcoholic
items.description: It has all the finesse and gentle sweetness of JC le Roux la Fleurette. Its mouth-filling sweetness and clean finish will enliven any occasion!

items.name: Pongrácz Brut
items.description: Delicate yeasty tones, layered with toast and ripe fruit. Firm mousse. Big, foamy mouthful, black fruit flavours with good length.

items.name: Pongrácz Rosé
items.description: Blush and savoury tang, dry, light and bright.

items.name: Graham Beck Rosé
items.description: Fresh berry fruit and oatmeal cookie undertones.

items.name: Steenberg Brut Chardonnay
items.description: Baked apple nuances, tightly wound, very fresh.

items.name: Kleine Zalze Cape Nectar Rosé
items.description: Aromas of strawberries and red berries followed by tropical fruit.

items.name: Valdo Extra Dry
items.description: Made from a unique blend of Glera and Nerello grapes with notes of red berries and crisp apple aroma

items.name: Moët & Chandon Brut
items.description: Mellow and harmonious with well-developed flavours and a persistent mousse.

items.name: Moët & Chandon Nectar Imperial
items.description: Velvety creamy butter citrus notes delicate bubbles light yeasty aromas pears litchi.

items.name: Moët & Chandon Brut Rosé
items.description: A style distinguished by its bright fruitiness, its seductive palate and its elegant maturity.

items.name: Veuve Clicquot
items.description: Initial notes of fruit are followed by more discreet aromas of brioche and vanilla.

items.name: Glen Carlou Petite
items.description: Smoke overlays, black cherry fruit.

items.name: Allée Bleue Blue Owl
items.description: Fresh and zesty, packed with winter melons, apricot and citrus aftertaste.

items.name: Eikendal Janina
items.description: Wealth of pickled lime, intense citrus zest.

items.name: Chamonix (Unoaked)
items.description: Pale lemon green colour and intense aroma.

items.name: Allée Bleue Isabeau (Wooded)
items.description: Stone Fruit, citrus and an underlying hint of oatmeal.

items.name: Kleine Zalze Cellar Selection
items.description: Luscious quince and tropical fruit with vanilla oak.

items.name: Secatuers
items.description: Delicious honey textures with underlying minerality.

items.name: Mulderbosch Steen op Hout
items.description: Smooth, clean and lemony with ripe apple notes.

items.name: L'Avenir Provenance
items.description: Precise and intense fruit aromas of white peach and melon, accented by subtle notes of honey and toasted almonds.

items.name: Ken Forrester Petit Natural Sweet
items.description: Ripe pineapple and honey, countered by lively acids.

items.name: Paul Cluver Riesling
items.description: Blossom fragrance and gentle sweetness and minerality.

items.name: Buitenverwachting Buiten Blanc
items.description: Mainly sauvignon blanc with dabs of chenin, semillon and gewürztraminer.

items.name: Saronsberg Earth in Motion
items.description: Prominent tropical aromas with typical Chenin and Sauvignon Blanc notes.

items.name: The Emily Chardonnay Pinot Noir
items.description: Aromas of ripe guava, pineapple, kiwi and fresh citrus with green apple.

items.name: Du Toitskloof
items.description: Herbs and fynbos, piquant gooseberry core.

items.name: Le Bonheur
items.description: Generous notes of green figs, gooseberries and crispy lime. Sauvignon Blanc flavours with elegance and classic Le Bonheur finesse.

items.name: Diemersdal
items.description: Aromas of citrus, green herbs, hints of asparagus and a touch of sweetness. Excellent natural acidity, a fine structure and a pleasant, clean finish.

items.name: Fryer's Cove
items.description: Concentrated Coastal aromas of guava, paw paw, green fig and lime, bursting with vibrant citrus fruit and a wonderful saline savouriness.

items.name: The Valley
items.description: Very fresh with ripe figs, gooseberry and grassy notes.

items.name: Springfield "Life from Stone"
items.description: Crispy assertive passionfruit oomph to please its many admirers.

items.name: Hermanuspietersfontein Kaalvoet Meisie
items.description: Green, crisp, grassiness and a harmonious balance and a finesse that will engage.

items.name: Strandveld Pofadder Bos
items.description: Ripe but fresh palate with blackcurrant tones.

items.name: Nederburg Rosé
items.description: Clean, fruity and refreshing flavours with a good acid structure.

items.name: Glen Carlou Pinot Rosé
items.description: Pronounced aromas of strawberry, citrus and passionfruit.

items.name: L'Avenir Horizon Rosé
items.description: An elegant and delicate expression of Pinotage rose, with notes of raspberries and pomegranates and a crisp touch of lime.

items.name: Hermanuspietersfontein Bloos
items.description: Hermanuspietersfontein Bloos is a unique Bordeaux-style blush wine, packed with red berries and a whiff of oak.

items.name: Du Toitskloof
items.description: Mulberries with tones of mint.

items.name: Kleine Zalze Cellar Selection
items.description: Plum compote with winter spice.

items.name: Hermanuspietersfontein 1855 Postmeester
items.description: A pleasant everyday drinking experience.

items.name: Le Bonheur
items.description: Elegant notes of ripe cherries, blackcurrant and cedarwood, with subtle hints of Potpourri and dark chocolate.

items.name: Glen Carlou
items.description: Blackberry fruit, medium bodied and soft.

items.name: Hartenberg Doorkeeper
items.description: Estate's younger vineyard, old oak aged.

items.name: Saronsberg Provenance
items.description: Scrumptious, savoury with well-balanced acidity.

items.name: First Sighting
items.description: Freshly ground pepper and mocha aromas layered with vibrant berries.

items.name: La Motte
items.description: Pepper and herb ease to rich plum fruit.

items.name: Warwick 'The First Lady'
items.description: The nose reveals lots of red berries and sweet black currents.

items.name: Le Bonheur
items.description: Classic notes of dense blackcurrant, cedarwood and hints of dark chocolate.

items.name: Kleine Zalze Vineyard Selection
items.description: Herbal notes and intense dark fruit, with fine tannins and integrated oak.

items.name: Springfield Wholeberry
items.description: Elegantly fruit filled, dusted with spice.

items.name: Beyerskloof
items.description: Spicy wood notes against rich plum and berry fruit.

items.name: Allée Bleue Blue Owl
items.description: Abundant strawberry and ripe cherry notes, with lush plummy fruit aromas.

items.name: Doolhof Dark Lady
items.description: Lovely fruit and wood balance, well integrated tannins.

items.name: Kanonkop Kadette
items.description: Pure mulberry and banana scents, subtle oak.

items.name: Secateurs Red
items.description: Red berries and a hint of white pepper.

items.name: Kanonkop Kadette
items.description: Deep ruby, red colour. It shows ripe raspberries, black current and mocha flavours on the nose and has dark chocolate and blackberry fruit.

items.name: Beyerskloof Synergy
items.description: Juicy, fruity and rounded.

items.name: Saronsberg Seismic
items.description: Bordeaux with all five varietals.

items.name: Hermanuspietersfontein Kleinboet
items.description: Generous length, rounded tannins, medium body.

items.name: Rupert & Rothschild Classique
items.description: Vibrant flavours of young berries, plums, liquorice and cassis with a hint of coriander and white pepper and a fresh, long finish.

items.name: Anthonij Rupert Optima
items.description: Packed with red and black fruit, lead pencil finish.

items.name: Lourensford The Dome
items.description: Vibrant red berry, fruit cradled by silky oak.

items.name: The Valley
items.description: Ripe berry, flavours of maraschino cherry, vibrant strawberry and raspberry notes.

items.name: Chamonix Feldsdar
items.description: Wild berries, spice, sour cherries and violets.

items.name: L'Avenir Single Block Chenin
items.description: Almond notes, becoming more citrus.

items.name: Framingham Sauvignon Blanc
items.description: From New Zealand. Aromas of gooseberry, pineapple, lime and blackcurrant with a zippy acidity.

items.name: Hamilton Russell Chardonnay
items.description: Melange of citrus, peach and honey notes.

items.name: Allée Bleue L'Amor Toujours
items.description: Flavours of fynbos, cedar and cigar box wrapped in blackberry.

items.name: Orpheus and the Raven No:42
items.description: Ripe plum and cherry fruit on the nose with a hint of toasty oak.

items.name: Meerlust Rubicon
items.description: Most elegant of the reds, refined and intense.

items.name: De Toren Z (Blend)
items.description: Bright plums, spice refined with French oak.

items.name: Saronsberg Full Circle
items.description: Shiraz, Mourvèdre, Grenache and Viognier, peachy perfume and lingering finish.

items.name: Beyerskloof Faith (Blend)
items.description: Dense forest fruits with subtle mocha.

items.name: Beyerskloof Diesel
items.description: Inspired by Beyers Truter's beloved canine companion.

items.name: Hartenberg The Stork Shiraz
items.description: Lovely fruit purity from clay rich soils.

items.name: Kanonkop Paul Sauer
items.description: Richly regarded as S.A's finest Bordeaux Style Blend.

items.name: Doolhof Single Varietal
items.description: Vibrant aromas of violets, cocoa and black pepper.

items.name: Van Loveren Almost Zero Sauvignon Blanc
items.description: Soft tropical and well balanced.

items.name: Van Loveren Almost Zero Merlot
items.description: Rich with mulberry flavours.

items.name: Van Loveren Almost Zero Muscato Rosé
items.description: Rose petal and strawberry.

items.name: Muratie Amber Forever
items.description: Dried fruit notes and a hint of raisin.

items.name: Groot Constantia Grand Constance
items.description: Typical Muscat. Enhanced by nuances of pear, apricot, peach, rose petals and nuts.

items.name: Klein Constantia Vin de Constance
items.description: a Natural sweet Dessert wine made from Muscat de Frontignan.

items.name: Beyerskloof Pinotage
items.description: Spicy wood notes against rich plum and berry fruits.
